definition: coming together and separating/aggregation and dissipation
to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
variant of 散[san4]

sentences.english: Lenses change the vergence of light waves.
sentences.chinese: 透镜可以改变光波的聚散度。

sentences.english: Between gather and disperse, achieved the ultimate distillation of his human nature.
sentences.chinese: 聚散之间，成就了人性的终极升华。

sentences.english: Others are stronger cities assemble and part story.
sentences.chinese: 城市的聚散悲欢都是别人的故事。
爱情看穿了，不过是聚散。

sentences.english: And a, edge to edge, who did not expect each other is always thought?
sentences.chinese: 聚散一场，缘来缘往，谁不曾奢望是彼此永远的念想？

sentences.english: Send you a song, ask Quzhong people gather.
sentences.chinese: 寄君一曲，不问曲终人聚散。

definition: to take leave of/to leave/separation
variable/changeable/fickle/impermanence (Sanskrit: anitya)/ghost taking away the soul after death/to pass away/to die
mist/smoke/cloud
ups and downs (of life etc)/to drift along/to sink and emerge
to meet (by chance)/to come across
to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
clutch (in car gearbox)/separation and reunion
joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life
passing traveler/transient guest/sojourner
waxing and waning (of the moon)
life is but a dream (idiom)
to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
lit. sinking and floating/to bob up and down on water/ebb and flow/fig. rise and fall/ups and downs of fortune/vicissitudes
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
so close, yet worlds apart (idiom)
the passage of the years/the flow of time
